mapper.sql: id, name, CONVERT(AES_DECRYPT(password, UNHEX(MD5('${DB_ENCODE_KEY}'))) USING UTF8) AS password, role, birthday, telephone, email, jlpt_level, jtest_level, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into tu_user (id, name, password, role, birthday, telephone, email, jlpt_level, jtest_level, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNHEX(MD5('${DB_ENCODE_KEY}'))), #{role,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{telephone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jlptLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jtestLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update tu_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
password = AES_ENCRYPT(#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNHEX(MD5('${DB_ENCODE_KEY}'))),

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
